00017 COrderingInfo::COrderingInfo( CExeFile &ExeFile ) {
00018  std::string datadirectory = ExeFile.getDataDirectory();
00019  char episode = ExeFile.getEpisode();
00020 
00021  mp_Scrollsurface = g_pVideoDriver->ScrollSurface;
00022  m_Map.setScrollSurface(mp_Scrollsurface);
00023 
00024  CMapLoader Maploader(&m_Map);
00025  
00026  Maploader.load(episode, 90, datadirectory);
00027  m_Map.gotoPos( 22<<4, 32 );
00028  
00029  // Get the offset where in the data the info is...
00030  size_t offset = 0;
00031  switch(episode)
00032  {
00033   case 1:
00034    m_starty = 4; // start of y-coordinate in textheights
00035    m_numberoflines = 21; // numberof lines to print
00036    if(ExeFile.getEXEVersion() == 131)
00037     offset = 0x1652B-512;
00038 
00039    // Change the ugly lower Tiles which are seen, when using 320x240 base resolution
00040    for(int i=0; i<20 ; i++)
00041    {
00042     m_Map.changeTile(22+i, 15, 14*13);
00043     m_Map.changeTile(22+i, 16, 14*13+3);
00044    }
00045 
00046    break;
00047   case 2:
00048    m_starty = 3; // start of y-coordinate in textheights
00049    m_numberoflines = 19; // numberof lines to print
00050    m_Map.gotoPos( 22<<4, 28 );
00051    if(ExeFile.getEXEVersion() == 131)
00052     offset = 0x1ACD9-512;
00053    break;
00054   case 3:
00055    m_starty = 4; // start of y-coordinate in textheights
00056    m_numberoflines = 17; // numberof lines to print
00057    if(ExeFile.getEXEVersion() == 131)
00058     offset = 0x1CDED-512;
00059    break;
00060  }
00061  m_Map.drawAll();
00062 
00063  // Read the strings and save them the string array of the class
00064  if(offset)
00065  {
00066   char *data;
00067   data = (char*)ExeFile.getRawData() + offset;
00068   std::string buf;
00069   for(int i=0 ; i<m_numberoflines ; i++)
00070   {
00071    if(*data == '\0')
00072    {
00073     data++;
00074     while(*data == '\0')
00075      data++;
00076    }
00077    while(*data != '\n' and *data != '\0') // For the next line
00078    {
00079     buf.push_back(*data);
00080     data++;
00081    }
00082    data++;
00083    m_Textline.push_back(buf);
00084    
00085    buf.clear();
00086   }
00087  }
00088  
00089  //This just makes them all line up exactly like in the original games.
00090  switch(episode)
00091  {
00092   case 1:
00093    m_Textline[1] = " " + m_Textline[1];
00094    m_Textline[2] = m_Textline[2] + "  ";
00095    m_Textline[3] = m_Textline[3] + " ";
00096    m_Textline[4] = " " + m_Textline[4];
00097    m_Textline[5] = " " + m_Textline[5];
00098    m_Textline[6] = " " + m_Textline[6];
00099    m_Textline[8] = m_Textline[8] + "   ";
00100    m_Textline[9] = m_Textline[9] + "   ";
00101    m_Textline[10] = m_Textline[10] + "     ";
00102    m_Textline[11] = m_Textline[11] + "           ";
00103    m_Textline[13] = m_Textline[13] + "  ";
00104    m_Textline[14] = m_Textline[14] + "  ";
00105    m_Textline[15] = m_Textline[15] + "  ";
00106    m_Textline[20] = m_Textline[20] + "   ";
00107    break;
00108   case 2:
00109    m_Textline[2] = m_Textline[2] + "     ";
00110    m_Textline[4] = m_Textline[4] + " ";
00111    m_Textline[5] = m_Textline[5] + " ";
00112    m_Textline[6] = m_Textline[6] + " ";
00113    m_Textline[7] = m_Textline[7] + "   ";
00114    m_Textline[8] = m_Textline[8] + "         ";
00115    m_Textline[10] = m_Textline[10] + "           ";
00116    m_Textline[11] = m_Textline[11] + "           ";
00117    m_Textline[12] = m_Textline[12] + "           ";
00118    m_Textline[13] = m_Textline[13] + "         ";
00119    m_Textline[15] = m_Textline[15] + "  ";
00120    m_Textline[16] = m_Textline[16] + "    ";
00121    break;
00122   case 3:
00123    m_Textline[0] = m_Textline[0] + "     ";
00124    m_Textline[1] = m_Textline[1] + "   ";
00125    m_Textline[2] = m_Textline[2] + "       ";
00126    m_Textline[4] = m_Textline[4] + "   ";
00127    m_Textline[5] = m_Textline[5] + "   ";
00128    m_Textline[6] = m_Textline[6] + "   ";
00129    m_Textline[7] = m_Textline[7] + "     ";
00130    m_Textline[8] = m_Textline[8] + "           ";
00131    m_Textline[10] = m_Textline[10] + "    ";
00132    m_Textline[11] = m_Textline[11] + "   ";
00133    m_Textline[12] = m_Textline[12] + " ";
00134    m_Textline[13] = m_Textline[13] + "      ";
00135    m_Textline[16] = m_Textline[16] + "  ";
00136    break;
00137  }
00138 }
00139 
00140 void COrderingInfo::process()
00141 {  
00142   if(!m_Textline.size())
00143   {
00144    g_pLogFile->textOut(RED,"Sorry, but the ordering information text could not be read. Returning to the main menu...<br>");
00145    m_destroy_me=true;
00146    return;
00147   }
00148   
00149   for(int i=0 ; i<m_numberoflines ; i++)
00150    g_pGfxEngine->getFont(0).drawFont(g_pVideoDriver->FGLayerSurface, m_Textline[i], 160-m_Textline[i].size()*4, 8*(i+m_starty), true);
00151  
00152  if(g_pInput->getPressedAnyKey())
00153   m_destroy_me=true;
00154 }
